name: Traveler-Geo
desc: A traveler from another world who had their only kin taken away, forcing them to embark on a journey to find The Seven.

battle_talent.normal_desc2: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
battle_talent.normal_desc3: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
battle_talent.element_desc:
You disgorge a meteorite from the depths of the earth, dealing AoE Geo DMG. The meteorite is considered a Geo Construct, and can be climbed or used to block attacks.
Hold: This skill's positioning may be adjusted.
battle_talent.final_desc:
Energizing the Geo elements deep underground, you set off expanding shockwaves.
Launches surrounding opponents back and deals AoE Geo DMG.
A stone wall is erected at the edges of the shockwave.
The stone wall is considered a Geo Construct, and may be used to block attacks.

basic_talent.talent2_desc: The final hit of a Normal Attack combo triggers a collapse, dealing 60% of ATK as AoE Geo DMG.

sof.sof1_desc: Party members within the radius of Wake of Earth have their CRIT Rate increased by 10% and have increased resistance against interruption.
sof.sof2_desc: When the meteorite created by Starfell Sword is destroyed, it will also explode, dealing additional AoE Geo DMG equal to the amount of damage dealt by Starfell Sword.
sof.sof3_desc:
Increases the Level of Wake of Earth by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof4_desc:
The shockwave triggered by Wake of Earth regenerates 5 Energy for every opponent hit.
A maximum of 25 Energy can be regenerated in this manner at any one time.
sof.sof5_desc:
Increases the Level of Starfell Sword by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
sof.sof6_desc:
The barrier created by Wake of Earth lasts 5s longer.
The meteorite created by Starfell Sword lasts 10s longer.
